actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to reduce social security payroll taxes by amending the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Payroll Tax Reduction Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to finance the hospital insurance program under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act through general revenues rather than through taxes on employers, employees, and the self-employed.

titles.title: A bill to reduce social security payroll taxes by amending the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
